werewolf.instruction: WEREWOLVES, wake up and look for other Werewolves
werewolf.instruction2: If there is only one Werewolf you may look at a card from the center

werewolf2.instruction: WEREWOLVES, wake up and look for other Werewolves
werewolf2.instruction2: If there is only one Werewolf you may look at a card from the center

mason.instruction: MASONS, wake up and look for other Masons

mason2.instruction: MASONS, wake up and look for other Masons

seer.instruction: SEER, wake up. You may look at another player's card or two of the center cards.

troublemaker.instruction: TROUBLEMAKER, wake up. You may exchange cards between two other players.

minion.instruction: MINION, wake up. Werewolves, stick out your thumb so the Minion can see who you are.

drunk.instruction: DRUNK, wake up and exchange your card with a card from the center.

insomniac.instruction: INSOMNIAC, wake up and look at your card.

robber.instruction: ROBBER, wake up. You may exchange your card with another player's card, and then view your new card.
